lv.emes.libraries.communication.tcp_ip

Class MS_TcpIPAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv.emes.libraries.communication.tcp_ip.MS_TcpIPAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MS_TcpIPClient, MS_TcpIPServer

    public abstract class MS_TcpIPAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    TCP/IP common core things that contains methods for communication. This class will be overridden to implement MS_TcpIPClient and MS_TcpIPServer.
    Version:
    1.2.
    Author:
    eMeS
    See Also:
    MS_TcpIPClient, MS_TcpIPServer
